[[inst_v_lhui]]
==== V.LHUI

*Syntax:* v.lhui<.local> [SrcL<.ud>, <lc0<<1>, simm], ->Dst.<W>

*Description:* Vector instruction (VEC engine).

image::../generated/encodings/enc_v_lhui.svg[V.LHUI encoding,width=800]

*Uop-Class:* VEC

*Compression:* L64 (len=64)

*Uop-Class payload:* `{"addr_mode": "BASE_IMM", "agu_kind": "LDA", "note": "vector-prefix override: dispatch to VEC (subkind=AGU)", "source": "override", "uop_kind": "VEC", "vec_subkind": "AGU"}`
